file_content.text: Scanning = in progress
Scanning = complete. Transmission ++
Can you hear me, my lord? There's a sandstorm interfering with communications, but I wanted to report.
Can you hear me? There's a sandstorm coming in, but I wanted to report.
The droid's locked onto an underground power signature--must be an artifact in the Czerka base. We've also found some kind of recorded message.
Any idea who it's coming from?
What's the source?
So? Play it already.
Patching it through now.
Does it give us a way inside?
How's that help?
Can't be sure. I'll patch it through.
Is this thing working? Blast. Security Officer Grommik, here.
I'm the last man out. We've been ordered to seal Czerka Secret Weapons Division 7.
The base was compromised. We thought we had the problem contained to the artifact cave, but... it didn't last.
Okay. Sealing the doors now. Anyone who sees this--don't come in. You don't want to. You really don't want to.
They lost the whole base. Imagine that.
We've got fragmentary codes and coordinates, but you'll need to run additional scans to unlock the base. There may be more messages, too.
We both know if anything is still alive in that base, you're our best chance of retrieving Czerka's artifacts. You'll have to go alone.
You've served well, Captain Golah.
Excellent work.
It's all the team, my lord. We've sacrificed a lot for this expedition.
Only a Sith can understand true ancient power.
As it should be.
I like to think my years with the Reclamation Service count for something.
Uncovering secrets is my job, Captain. I won't disappoint you.
I'm good with these things.
Let the games begin.
Time for fun.
Understood.
Sounds like a plan. My team--those of us who are left--will be waiting.
Your team wouldn't be much help down there, anyway.
You'd only get in the way.
Those of us who are left. Fair enough.
Part of me wishes I were going. Czerka found something unthinkably old and alien.
But this is how it has to happen. Golah out.
Communications = unauthorized
